#summary Download Native Client
#labels Featured

Native Client is a research technology,
and *we do not consider it secure*.
We encourage you to experiment with the technology,
but do so at your own risk.
Please [Uninstall uninstall the plug-in] when you're not using it for development or testing.
Whenever you reinstall the plug-in,
be sure to use the latest version.

Here are the current downloads:

  * [http://nativeclient.googlecode.com/files/nacl_linux_0.1_28_2008_10_22.tgz Source with prebuilt binaries and SDK: Linux]
  * [http://nativeclient.googlecode.com/files/nacl_mac_0.1_28_2008_10_22.tgz Source with prebuilt binaries and SDK: Mac]
  * [http://nativeclient.googlecode.com/files/nacl_windows_0.1_28_2008_10_22.zip Source with prebuilt binaries and SDK: Windows]
  * [http://nativeclient.googlecode.com/files/nacl_source_0.1_28_2008_10_22.tgz Source only]

If you've never used Native Client before,
follow the instructions in the
[http://nativeclient.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/nacl/googleclient/native_client/documentation/getting_started.html Getting Started guide].


For more information on Native Client downloads, including file sizes,
see the [http://code.google.com/p/nativeclient/downloads/list detailed download page].
For information about the current release, see ReleaseNotes.
